name: projectupdown-workspace
description: Workspace scripts for split hi-lo services

scripts.start:all: concurrently -n server,admin,merchant,gateway -c cyan,magenta,green,yellow "npm run start:server" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:merchant" "npm run start:gateway"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix hi-lo-server && npm install --prefix hi-lo-admin && npm install --prefix hi-lo-merchant
